title: POST /maintenance-windows
description: Create a new maintenance window in UptimeRobot API v3

name.description: Friendly name of the maintenance window

autoAddMonitors.description: If true, all monitors are automatically added to this maintenance window

interval.description: Recurrence interval of the maintenance window

date.description: Start date of the maintenance window in YYYY-MM-DD format (years 19xx or 20xx only)

time.description: Start time of the maintenance window in HH:mm:ss format

duration.description: Duration of the maintenance window in minutes. Maintenance window will be active for this duration

days.description: Days for weekly/monthly maintenance windows. For weekly: day of week (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, etc.). For monthly: day of month (1-31, use -1 for last day). Example: [2, 4, 5] for Tue/Thu/Fri or [10, 17, 26] for specific dates

monitorIds.description: List of monitor IDs to be assigned to the maintenance window
